features.title: Features
features.subtitle: All the best technologies out there!
features.description: Discover Kavach, the next-generation KYC application designed to make identity verification simple, secure, and efficient. With a seamless user experience and advanced AI technology, Kavach ensures a hassle-free KYC process, safeguarding your personal information every step of the way.

items.name: Seamless User Experience
items.description: Kavach offers an intuitive interface for easy navigation through registration, form filling, and document upload, ensuring a smooth and hassle-free process.

items.name: Advanced AI Technology
items.description: Leveraging cutting-edge AI, Kavach performs accurate and efficient biometric and document verification, minimizing manual checks and enhancing reliability.

items.name: High Security
items.description: With robust security measures, Kavach protects your personal and sensitive information, preventing fraud and identity theft.

items.name: Personalised ChatBot Support
items.description: Our intelligent chatbot provides immediate assistance and guidance throughout the KYC process, answering questions about registration, document upload, and verification status.
